resources.string: Tasks that only require one hand. Great for when you\'re on the go.
Tasks that require two hands. Typically take a little more time and focus than 1-handed tasks.
Tasks that require seclusion and a greater amount of time and attention to complete.
Tasks that require a single, continuous session, but have a higher payout.
Tasks that may require traveling or activity.
For the adventurous - generates a task from a random category!
